Table: report

A report is a publication that may have chapters, figures, findings, and tables.

report Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY

A descriptive identifier.
title character varying NOT NULL

The title.
url character varying UNIQUE

A url for a landing page.
doi character varying UNIQUE

A digital object identifier.
_public boolean DEFAULT true

Indicates that this report is publically readable.
report_type.identifier report_type_identifier character varying NOT NULL DEFAULT 'report'::character varying

The type of this report.
summary character varying

A brief summary
frequency interval

If this is a periodic report, how often it is released.
publication_year integer

The year of publication.
topic character varying

A brief free form comma-separated list of topics associated with this report.
in_library boolean

Whether or not this report is available in the USGCRP resources library.
contact_note character varying

A note about contacting someone about this report. Phrases [in brackets] in this note will become links to the contact_email.
contact_email character varying

A contact email address for this report.
_featured_priority integer

 

report Constraints
Name Constraint
ck_report_identifier CHECK (((identifier)::text ~ similar_escape('[a-z0-9_-]+'::text, NULL::text)))
ck_report_pubyear CHECK (((publication_year > 0) AND (publication_year < 9999)))
report_doi_check CHECK (((doi)::text ~ '^10.[[:print:]]+/[[:print:]]+$'::text))

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

_report_editor
_report_viewer
chapter
figure
finding
table
